perturbation.original_text:
6.2 Payments. All payments hereunder shall be payable to IMNTV in United States Dollars on a quarterly basis upon receipt from the wireless carriers in the Territory, except as follows:
(a) First Payment. The first payment to IMNTV will be payable upon receipt at the end of the first calendar quarter after Launch, and will include any amounts due, pro-rated based on the number of days in such period of time; and
(b) Last Payment. The last payment to IMNTV will be payable upon receipt at the end of the first full month after the termination or expiration of this Agreement, and will include any amounts due: for the last month that the Programming is available, prorated based on the number of days in such final period.
(c) Other Exceptions. All payments hereunder are exclusive of: (i) any trial or promotional periods during which a Subscriber receives access to the Programming before such Subscriber’s credit card is charged; and (ii) refunds, charge backs and fees attributable to contested credit card transactions
(d) Summary of Timing. The parties acknowledge the following that establishes timing of payments: (1) Distributor receives a carrier statement saying how much Distributor will be paid; (2) 30-45 days later the Carrier pays Distributor; (3) when Distributor is paid by a carrier, Distributor makes royalty payments to IMNTV.
(e) Exchange Rate. Payments to IMNTV will be converted from local currency to US Dollars at the official exchange rate posted on the day payments are made to IMNTV via wire transfer provided that currency exchange is approved by the relevant Chinese currency exchange administrative agency.
perturbation.changed_text:
6.2 Payments. All payments hereunder shall be payable to IMNTV in United States Dollars on a monthly basis upon receipt from the wireless carriers in the Territory, except as follows:
(a) First Payment. The first payment to IMNTV will be payable upon receipt at the end of the first calendar quarter after Launch, and will include any amounts due, pro-rated based on the number of days in such period of time; and
(b) Last Payment. The last payment to IMNTV will be payable upon receipt at the end of the second full month after the termination or expiration of this Agreement, and will include any amounts due: for the last month that the Programming is available, prorated based on the number of days in such final period.
(c) Other Exceptions. All payments hereunder are exclusive of: (i) any trial or promotional periods during which a Subscriber receives access to the Programming before such Subscriber’s credit card is charged; and (ii) refunds, charge backs and fees attributable to contested credit card transactions
(d) Summary of Timing. The parties acknowledge the following that establishes timing of payments: (1) Distributor receives a carrier statement saying how much Distributor will be paid; (2) 30-45 days later the Carrier pays Distributor; (3) when Distributor is paid by a carrier, Distributor makes royalty payments to IMNTV.
(e) Exchange Rate. Payments to IMNTV will be converted from local currency to US Dollars at the official exchange rate posted on the day payments are made to IMNTV via wire transfer provided that currency exchange is approved by the relevant Chinese currency exchange administrative agency.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction. It changes the payment schedule to monthly while the 'First Payment' sub-clause still refers to 'the end of the first calendar quarter after launch'. Also the last payment has been shifted to 'the end of the second full month'. This creates ambiguity as to when payments are due and introduces potential for dispute.

perturbation.original_text: 6.5 Reporting. Distributor will provide IMNTV with a quarterly report or monthly report if available, summarizing the data relevant to the payment obligations herein within five (5) business days from the end of the calendar quarter. The reports will contain sufficient information to permit Provider to verify payments hereunder.
perturbation.changed_text: 6.5 Reporting. Distributor will provide IMNTV with a bi-annual report or monthly report if available, summarizing the data relevant to the payment obligations herein within fifteen (15) business days from the end of the calendar quarter. The reports will contain sufficient information to permit Provider to verify payments hereunder.
perturbation.explanation: This change creates an in-text contradiction related to reporting frequency and deadline. The original text specifies 'quarterly report' but the changed text specifies 'bi-annual report' which contradicts the 'quarterly report' in 6.2 and changes the deadline from five to fifteen business days.

perturbation.original_text: 7.1 General Termination Rights. Either party may terminate the Agreement at any time in the event of a material breach by the other party that remains uncured after thirty (30) days written notice of the breach.
perturbation.changed_text: 7.1 General Termination Rights. Either party may terminate the Agreement at any time in the event of a material breach by the other party that remains uncured after fifteen (15) days written notice of the breach.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction regarding the cure period for a material breach. The original text allows for thirty (30) days to cure a breach but the modified version shortens this period to fifteen (15) days, creating uncertainty and potential disputes regarding termination rights.
